text: hananim-i samudeu baegseong-ege geudeul-ui hyeongje salleleul bonaeni geuga ileudeola baegseong-iyeo hananim-eul gyeongbaehala geu bun oeeneun sin-i eobsnola ije neohui junim-eulobuteo neohuiegeyejung-i ileuleossgeoneul igeos-i hananim-i neohuiege yejung-eulo bonaen amnag tala geulihani hananim-ui daeji wi eseo pul-eul tteuddolog noh-adudoe haechi ji malla geuleohji anihamyeon neohuiga gotongseuleoun beol-eul bad-eulila
